name: Fireman Simulator
description:
Welcome to the exciting 3D firefighter simulator. In this game you have to perform your actions very carefully, quickly and smartly. In fact you are chosen to become a firefighter because of the city of your courage and real mind.

There are many rescue operations and you need to be in an emergency all the time. Wait and call 911 be ready. You can drive around the big city, suburbs, construction sites, parks and even on the beach. It's crazy how the city lives-car traffic. Get into a fire truck, fasten your seat belts and be a city traffic racer. Become a hero who saves lives!

So, now your duty-to save civilians and hotels to extinguish, cars, garages, planes, helicopters. You have to protect people using your fire skill. Manage your Emergency quick vehicle, which is provided by the division of fire of the bridge and rescues people from the fire.

The main purpose of these games is to teach children the real meaning of humanity, the real means of that feeling that happened when you save someone else.
Multi-level game, so growing levels and rescue missions are more difficult and deadly. The whole city is under the threat of burning buildings, gas leaks and accidents, you are the only one who is responsible for solving these problems. Your task is to save people and take them to save the place.

This is a very big responsibility, because many lives depend on you and your help. There is also a time limit because you don't have all day to get to the place of help. As we know that fire is merciless - you have to get to the place as fast as you can, in a short period of time and complete the rescue mission, be careful.

Features of the simulator:

- Numerous exciting, challenging and challenging missions
- Full 3D immersion.
Is a driving game smooth controls.
- Realistic big city with graphics.
- Engaging 911 emergency missions.
- Fighting fire with water cannons.
- Many different routes around the city.
- Amazing and realistic sound effect.
- Modern fire trucks and water tanks
